methods_of_collection: directly from users when they sign up for an account or request information
data_usage: to create and administer user accounts
to prevent fraud and unauthorized access
data_disclosure: Affiliates and corporate partners for operational purposes
Service providers and business partners for hosting, auditing, and data processing
Government authorities as required by law or for regulatory compliance
During corporate transactions (e.g., mergers or acquisitions)
With user consent
retention_period: as long as reasonably necessary for the purposes outlined in the Privacy Policy

methods_of_collection: directly from users when purchasing products or services
data_usage: to comply with financial and legal obligations
data_disclosure: Payment processors and financial institutions
Service providers handling billing and accounting
Government authorities for tax and legal compliance
retention_period: as long as necessary for financial, accounting, and legal compliance; otherwise destroyed or anonymized

types_of_data_collected: Inputs and Outputs (Prompts, Conversations, Generated Responses)
methods_of_collection: directly from users through interactions with services such as chat or coding interfaces
data_usage: to provide and improve AI services
to train AI models (unless users opt out)
for safety, security, and policy enforcement
data_disclosure: Affiliates for research and development
Service providers assisting in model training and maintenance
Government authorities for lawful requests or safety reasons
Third parties in cases of legal, fraud, or safety investigations
With user consent
retention_period: as long as reasonably necessary for service improvement and safety purposes

methods_of_collection: directly from users through rating or feedback mechanisms
data_usage: to improve services and train models
data_disclosure: Affiliates and internal teams for research and model training
Service providers supporting analytics or data storage
retention_period: as long as reasonably necessary; may be de-identified for model training and research

methods_of_collection: directly from users during communication via chatbot, help desk, or contact forms
data_disclosure: Service providers assisting with support operations
Affiliates for internal business coordination
Government authorities when required by law
retention_period: as long as reasonably necessary for customer support and operational purposes

methods_of_collection: automatically collected through device or browser during service use
data_usage: to provide, maintain, and secure services
data_disclosure: Service providers for analytics and monitoring
Affiliates for performance improvement
Government authorities when required by law
retention_period: as long as necessary for operational, analytical, and security purposes

methods_of_collection: automatically collected through user activity logs and analytics tools
data_disclosure: Service providers and analytics vendors
Affiliates for research and development
Government authorities as required by law
retention_period: as long as reasonably necessary for analytics and service improvement

methods_of_collection: automatically collected through system logs when errors occur
data_usage: to debug and identify system issues
data_disclosure: Service providers and infrastructure hosts for system maintenance
Affiliates for technical support
Government authorities in case of security or compliance matters
retention_period: as long as required for debugging and operational monitoring

methods_of_collection: indirectly through browser cookies, scripts, and similar tracking technologies
data_usage: to market additional products or services
data_disclosure: Analytics and advertising partners
Service providers managing cookie data
Affiliates for personalization and marketing
retention_period: as described in the Cookie Policy; typically until cookies expire or are deleted by the user

methods_of_collection: indirectly from public sources, commercial datasets, user-provided data, and feedback
data_usage: to enhance service safety and quality
data_disclosure: Affiliates and internal research teams
Third-party data providers under commercial agreements
Government or regulators where required by law

methods_of_collection: derived from processing or transforming collected personal data
data_disclosure: Affiliates for research and analytics
Service providers supporting aggregate analysis
Public research or safety reports where individual users are not identifiable
retention_period: not specified; retained as de-identified data for ongoing research and improvement
